thread.section_title: Grasscity Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Grasscity | www.grasscity.com
thread.title: Parsten

author: Parsten
title: Parsten
text:
I ordered a bong which was broken on arrival. Even though I waited for about 2 weeks to create the ticket and send pictures, the service was excellent and I got a full refund (and they did not make me send the bong back, reducing shipping and thereby my carbon footprint). I also got to keep the old bong which I taped together - it kind of works sometime most of the time.
Buy your glassware at grasscity.com! I'd do it again and again.
